oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Marketing yourself as a new grad: ePortfolios, cover letters and CV/resumé
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Colon, Jorge
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: differentiation
professional growth
identify development
value
self-marketing
ePortfolio
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: As stated by motivational speaker Jim Rohn, “You don’t get paid for the work that you do, you get paid for the value you bring to the marketplace”.3 This session covers several essential tools that new graduates should use to showcase to potential employ­ers the value they bring to a veterinary position. The impor­tance of possessing skills that go beyond being an excellent vet­erinarian will be highlighted as a pathway towards achieving differentiation in the self-marketing process.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 56 (2023): 2023 Annual Conference Proceedings ; 141-144
